text: Me hate tangaloi rau mwereire nomu sinobu tau Israel. A burigi gategale hogosie ngehinge i nigo gu vagamwasoire vena rain voragi nomu sibomu. Me gu vei na henamu sibona. Me gu vei gineu lalawoa gagarea, siu huri gu livusi na taureure sao mena nora huqe sao dena nom sinobu, ngerehi gu vagamwasoire dena Ijib.
